column4: my update manager says that my dpkg is interrupted can anyone help me with that
best to just ask the channel your actual question (on a single line)
what are you trying to do exactly?
no one can help you if you do not answer questions
the one for your current user
on ubuntu.  If you want me to see what you say please prefix your message with "jrib: "
yes, so enter the password for kersee1
you type, but you do not see yourself typing
yes, it won't move.  Just type your password and then press enter.
and please start using my nick.
you should get a new command prompt and maybe some output
you don't have to leave this channel to try it
what is the output of « groups »?
press the letters "groups" and press enter
